participant_1.name: Alex Carter
participant_1.personality: Optimistic and driven, always looking for ways to make a positive impact.
participant_1.background: I'm doing my best to stay positive and make the most of my time in school, but I miss being a kid sometimes. I spend my day engineering sustainable solutions for the environment while listening to the Rolling Stones. It's great fun. I feel closer to some of my family members than others. I am six feet tall.

participant_2.name: Jordan Lee
participant_2.personality: Easygoing and adaptable, I prioritize comfort and enjoy helping others.
participant_2.background: I do my laundry on a weekly basis. I used to wear tight clothes, but now I prefer more comfortable options. I like to play outside. My family is not very wealthy, but we do what we can to help those in need. I'm trying to make up for my past mistakes by using my engineering skills to help make the world a better place.

content.text: What's up
Nothing much, just chillin
Same here, just got home from class
Oh what do you study?
Engineering.
Nice! What kind of engineering?
Sustainable engineering.
Oh wow, that's really cool. What made you want to do that?
I like the idea of making a difference in the world.
That's great! I wish I could say the same about my job.
What do you do?
I'm a customer service representative for a big company.
Oh, that sounds like it can be stressful.
It can be, but it's not too bad.
Well I'm glad you're enjoying your work.
Thanks! What do you like to do for fun?
I like to play video games, go out with friends, and play sports.
Oh cool, I like to play video games too.
What games do you like to play?
I like to play a lot of different games, but I really like open world games.
Me too! I love exploring and finding new things.
Yeah, it's the best.
Do you have a favorite game?
I don't know if I have a favorite, but I really like the Elder Scrolls games.
Me too! Those games are so much fun
